channel.title: violence on Crime and Justice Chart of the Week
channel.description: Recent content in violence on Crime and Justice Chart of the Week

item.title: For women, attackers are more likely to have a familiar face
item.description: Men of all ages are more likely to be attacked by strangers than by people they know. Women have a lower risk of being victims of violence than men do, but (except before age 25) are as likely to be attacked by an acquaintance as by a stranger. Data source: Crime Survey for England and Wales, 2018
